messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
All right, my Pokémon squad!
Get out there and kick up a storm!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT: The squad failed to hit its stride...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Hmm...Gazing out over the sea doesn’t do a
thing for toughening up my Pokémon!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Ah, it’s been a long time!I have been toughening my fists
against the sea, just as before!
